title: Improving model representation of rapid ozone deposition over soil in the central Tibetan Plateau
content:
Environ. Sci.: Atmos., 2024, 4,252-264
DOI: 10.1039/D3EA00153A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Chong Zhang, Jianshu Wang, Yingjie Zhang, Wanyun Xu, Gen Zhang, Guofang Miao, Jiacheng Zhou, Hui Yu, Weixiong Zhao, Weili Lin, Ling Kang, Xuhui Cai, Hongsheng Zhang, Chunxiang Ye
Ozone deposition velocity with a daily mean of 0.49 cm s−1 was observed in the Tibetan Plateau and rationalized by local meteorological and soil conditions. Our research suggested widespread ozone deposition velocity over soil of 0.1–0.7 cm s−1.
